metadata.subject: Voltaire, 1694-1778
Voltaire, 1694-1778
Austrian Succession, War of, 1740-1748
Fontenoy, Battle of, Fontenoy, Hainaut, Belgium, 1745
metadata.title: Epitre du Sieur Rabot, maitre d'ecole de Fontenoy, sur les victoires du roy
metadata.creator: Robbé de Beauveset, Pierre-Honoré,1714?-1792
Robbé de Beauveset, Pierre-Honoré, 1714?-1792
metadata.note: Bound in a volume with manuscript title page: Campagne du roi, en mil sept cent quarente cinq, & premieres armes du dauphin; with engraving pasted on title page.
metadata.description: Poem; a parody of Voltaire's poem La Bataille de Fontenoy according to NUC pre-1956 cited below
Sieur Rabot is a pseud. of Robbé de Beauveset
Imprint from colophon, gives date of 10 Juillet 1745; false imprint, published in Paris, according to Weller, E.O. Falsche Druckorte, v. 2, p. 115
metadata.notes: No copyright page found. No table-of-contents pages found. Title is on the cover page. Uneven binding. Skewed text. Irregular pagination.
